WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoder

The WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoder class is a filter used by registering this instance to WaveSoundBuffer.filters, and provides Phase Vocoder functionality.
With the Phase Vocoder, you can change the pitch while maintaining the playback speed (pitch shifter), or change the playback speed while maintaining the pitch (time shifter).

Members

Constructor
PhaseVocoder
Methods
None
Properties
interface ( Get the interface object )
overlap ( Overlap count )
pitch ( Scale along the frequency axis )
time ( Scale along the time axis )
window ( Window size )
Events
None
